author: fwyzard
body:
Follow up of the work in #21652 .

Rename private `book...` methods to `book..._` to reduce the ambiguity of the public vs private interface.

[RFC]
Add methods to book (`Concurrent`)`MonitorElement`s passing ownership of an existing ROOT histogram or profile.
The idea is that users can book a `TH` / `TProfile`, customise it using the full interface provided by ROOT, and then give ownership to the `DQMStore` and wrap it in a (`Concurrent`)`MonitorElement`.
The only aspect that worries me is that users could hang to the original pointer to the ROOT object, and use it to bypass the locking mechanism of a ConcurrentMonitorElement.
title: more DQM-related developments, fixes and improvements (master branch)
